content:
There are quite a lot of PRs without a reviewer (going as far back as February). I think the triage team should look at these once in a while to make sure they're not forgotten.
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pulls?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Apr+no%3Aassignee
@Joshua Nelson most of them are experimental PRS or marked as ghost. So it is up to the author to ask for a review when ready
Sure, but it seems like a lot of them are never ready :/ I feel like we should check in and make sure the author still plans to work on it at some point
And some of them aren't intended to have no reviewer, like https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/82930
At the very least, anything with S-waiting-on-review and no reviewer seems wrong
I just triaged all the S-waiting-on-review + no assignee PRs, either marking them as S-waiting-on-author or assigning someone
The only remaining PR is #90727 because for some reason, GitHub refuses to assign @notriddle
